query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Report on System-aware Optimization for ITS
result.description: This report is the enhanced version of D4.4. On top of the system-awareness model developed in D4.4, this deliverable reports on optimization strategies to be applied in ITS systems. The provided optimization strategies will be evaluated in the use cases how the developed model for system-awareness can be applied and incorporates lessons learnt and required modification identified during the first round of pilots.

result.title: Periodic Dissemination and Collaboration Activities Report Y1
result.description: This deliverable will report on the dissemination activities of the period, including press releases and newsletters, on the collaboration activities with other ITS projects and on possible standardization activities. Since the Data Management is expected to mature during the project, more developed versions of the plan delivered in D8.4 will also be included in the Dissemination Activities Reports.

result.title: Website launched
result.description: A dedicated website maintained by University of Crete will be developed to provide both a key forum for internal multi-site communications and the programme publicity. The website will act as a single online workspace for all training, dissemination and outreach activities and will facilitate communications between all researchers at both partner locations. The intranet resources will provide a single repository for project electronic documentation and e-learning resources and will support online discussion and information exchange.
